column5: We will be going to Tobin for the first timeSept 23-27. Any help or tips for that time of yeargreatly appreciated.P.S. We are staying at Tobin Lake Village
Stop by the SilverTip outfitting store and talk to them. They are Great. Tell them Jimmy sent you-I'll be there Sept 30thJimbo

Hello, We are going to be fishing the river also on the 24 25 and 26 we are looking for a guide also for maybe a half day to get us steered in the right direction. E-mail me back and let me know if you got any info. Thanx Tim L Skinner
I used Silver Tip. I recommond him highly!!William Smith
